decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game through various spells and artifacts while utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up mana production. It aims to disrupt opponent's strategies with cards like Dismember and Thought-Knot Seer, while also utilizing Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opposing artifacts. The deck also includes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Glaring Fleshraker to apply pressure on the opponent. Overall, the key strategy is to outvalue and outcontrol the opponent with a combination of disruption, ramp, and powerful threats.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategies while building up your own board presence with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Prismatic Ending and Ephemerate to deal with threats, as well as White Orchid Phantom and Solitude to control the battlefield, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and secure victory. The inclusion of powerful enchantment creatures like Sanctifier en-Vec and Starfield Shepherd adds resilience and versatility to the strategy. With a mix of removal, disruption, and efficient creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and maintain control of the battlefield.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan by using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, combined with creatures that can both deal damage and control the board. The deck also includes powerful flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to continuously disrupt your opponent's strategy. The goal is to apply pressure with aggressive creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd while keeping your opponent on the back foot with control elements like Quantum Riddler and Witch Enchanter. The deck aims to disrupt, control, and overwhelm the opponent to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana to cast powerful spells while disrupting the opponent's strategy. By utilizing cards like Birthing Ritual and Coiling Oracle, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and control spells. The inclusion of cards like Endurance and Subtlety provides additional disruption and protection for key creatures. With a mix of aggression and control elements, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents in order to secure a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Dredge mechanics to fill the graveyard with key cards like Golgari Thug, Stinkweed Imp, and Prized Amalgam, enabling powerful combos with cards like Psychic Frog and Silversmote Ghoul. By utilizing cards like Creeping Chill and Winternight Stories, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents with a swarm of creatures and direct damage. Additionally, cards like Force of Negation and Otherworldly Gaze provide protection and disruption against opponents, while Cephalid Coliseum and fetch lands help to ensure consistency in drawing the necessary combo pieces.

The deck focuses on using instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to bring back powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Griselbrand from the graveyard at instant speed. Utilizing cards like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler to control the opponent's board while setting up the combo, the deck also includes disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and Force of Negation. The goal is to quickly reanimate a big threat and control the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on utilizing UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up and hit powerful spells and creatures. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Dismember and Karn, the Great Creator, while also utilizing powerful eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Devourer of Destiny. The deck also includes Ugin, Eye of the Storms for additional control and All Is Dust for board wipes. The combination of ramp, control, and powerful creatures makes this deck a formidable force in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up mana and cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and control spells. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy by using cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Kozilek's Command while also using Karn, the Great Creator to shut down artifact-heavy decks. Ugin, Eye of the Storms is used for board control and finishing off opponents, while All Is Dust can clear the board if needed. The deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with its efficient ramp and powerful threats.

This aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures with varying abilities to deal damage quickly and efficiently. It also includes a mix of spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames to control the board and finish off opponents. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and aggressive, utilizing Leyline cards to boost its effectiveness. The mana base is built to support the diverse color requirements of the deck, allowing for consistent plays and strong synergies between cards. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents early in the game and maintain pressure until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on using lands and Amulet of Vigor to ramp into Primeval Titan as quickly as possible, searching for powerful lands like Boseiju, Who Endures or Urza's Saga. Malevolent Rumble can clear the way for your creatures to swing for lethal damage. With the ability to generate a large amount of mana quickly, the deck can utilize cards like Scapeshift and Green Sun's Zenith to find key pieces to combo off and win the game in a single turn. The deck aims to assemble its combo pieces efficiently and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to respond.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Arboreal Grazer and Amulet of Vigor, allowing you to play big threats like Primeval Titan early on. The deck also includes combo pieces like Scapeshift and Malevolent Rumble to deal massive damage to your opponent in one turn. Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for important artifacts, while cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Gruul Turf provide utility and flexibility. Overall, this deck focuses on assembling powerful combos and overwhelming your opponent with big threats.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful lands and summon massive creatures like Primeval Titan. It utilizes cards like Amulet of Vigor and Urza's Saga to enable explosive plays and take advantage of land synergies. By tutoring for specific cards with Summoner's Pact and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck aims to assemble its key combo pieces such as Scapeshift for a game-winning combo. Additionally, cards like Malevolent Rumble provide disruption against opponents. The deck's strategy revolves around creating a powerful board state and overwhelming the opponent with massive creatures and land synergy.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and hand disruption cards. By controlling the board and disrupting your opponent's strategy, you can buy time to deploy your own threats or win conditions, such as Murktide Regent or Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler to help maintain resources and outvalue your opponent. Overall, the goal is to control the game and win through attrition and efficient plays.

This deck focuses on quickly putting powerful creatures like Griselbrand onto the battlefield through a combination of graveyard recursion and instant-speed reanimation spells. It also utilizes control elements like hand disruption and removal spells to protect its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The key strategy is to efficiently fill the graveyard with key creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and then use cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to cheat them into play for a game-ending play. The deck seeks to outpace the opponent and overwhelm them with its powerful threats.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using powerful Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Thought-Knot Seer, while also utilizing cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms to disrupt your opponent's game plan. The deck aims to assemble UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Tower) in order to generate a lot of mana quickly, allowing you to cast big threats like All is Dust and Sire of Seven Deaths. The deck also includes ways to manipulate your opponent's hand and graveyard, further enhancing your control over the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing control elements to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining card advantage and board control. It includes a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw abilities to slow down the opponent and take control of the game. The deck aims to maintain a strong defensive position while building up resources to ultimately outvalue the opponent and win the game through attrition. Additionally, the deck includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils to further control the game and limit the opponent's options.
